snippet.title: Moncage - Official Release Date Trailer
snippet.description:
Developed by Optillusion, Moncage is a stunning vignette puzzle adventure coming to Steam, iOS, Google Play, and TapTap 11/16. 

The game takes place inside a mysterious cube, with each side of the cube housing a unique world: be it an old factory, a light tower, an amusement park, or a church, etc. At first sight, they may seem random and unrelated, but upon closer look, you will become mesmerized by the subtle and intricate ways of how these worlds connect…

Steam wishlist: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1195290/Moncage/
TapTap Pre-registration: https://www.taptap.io/app/225365
Pre-order on AppStore: https://apps.apple.com/us/app/moncage/id1587860402

Contact us: 
Twitter: @MoncageTheGame 
Twitter: @XD_EN_Official
Facebook: @XDNetworkInc
Discord: https://discord.gg/CBMh4Y7w
